info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Deer Lodge, east central Granite and south central Powell Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Valley, or near Anaconda, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, West Valley, and Lost Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
